name: Armed Ninja Ops Zombie Arena
description:
Get ready for a thrilling epic bloodshed. You have played many warrior games' but this game is highly addictive unlike other action games'.

The most anticipated action game of 2018. You can experience the thrilling sensation with many features.

Features:
-free tap shooter game
-fast paced bloodshed game'
-Tactics and speed required
-Introduces new monsters and really challenging action
-Weapon features can be combined
-One of the most exciting battle game'

Start playing NOW this real action challenge and beat 'em up to get your revenge!
